content: I'm selling my ColdCard MK1 (Mark 1) still in his original sealed tamper bag.https://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171138_195-min0ce7697f709fc959.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171211_945-mind4356ac232e77956.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171239_143-min5d04a4984e57a7fc.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171259_649-min752459b5acd29d02.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171317_681-minfb0041aaf31e957d.jpeghttps://www.talkimg.com/images/2023/05/14/IMG_20230511_171336_296-min72cde678bde07bba.jpegPicking up in The Netherlands or shipping around the world. Payment with escrow. Costs: 865K sats.Reaction here or twitter @lukedca
